basics.name: Yee Man Ng
basics.summary:
A highly driven and proactive NLP researcher at Leiden University (LIACS), with a Research Master in Human Language Technology (Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam). Conducted research at the intersection of AI and language in an interdisciplinary setting. 
    Passionate about exploring the use of NLP to deal with complex societal issues.

work.company: Leiden Institute of Advanced Computer Science (Leiden University)
work.summary:
NLP Researcher, working on implementing generative AI in a daily diary app for cancer patients and survivors
     to achieve better insights out of their data, ultimately helping people better understand how their daily activities might affect their recovery.
